remarks: Lemma for ~ gexex .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)
statement:
gexex.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
gexex.2 $e |- E = ( gEx ` G ) $.
gexex.3 $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
gexexlem.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
gexexlem.2 $e |- ( ph -> E e. NN ) $.
gexexlem.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. X ) $.
gexexlem.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. X ) -> ( O ` y ) <_ ( O ` A ) ) $.
gexexlem $p |- ( ph -> ( O ` A ) = E ) $.
$d A y $.
$d E y $.
$d G y $.
$d O y $.
$d X y $.
